title: Idea Magazine
content:
I’m searching for a few back issues of Idea and I figured this was one of the few places I could track some down.

If you have a trade list or anything, please shoot me an email. My trade/sell list is [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215122857/http:/mlproject.com/trade.html).

author: mlproject
